mapper.select: select postID, postName, postSubsidy from tb_position
select postID, postName, postSubsidy from tb_position where postID = #{postID}

select student.stuUUID, student.stuName, position.postID, position.postName from tb_student student inner join tb_stu_position stu_position on student.stuUUID = stu_position.stuUUID inner join tb_position position on stu_position.postID = position.postID where stu_position.stuUUID = #{stuUUID}
